===Etymology===
Literally: Palace of Eternal Joy

}}

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} Changle Palace (a [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]] palace which was located in the ancient city of [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]])
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} Changle Palace (a [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]] palace which was located in [[w:Luoyang|Luoyang]])

===Usage notes===
By the Eastern Han Dynasty, the name of Changle Palace in Chang'an was changed to Yongle Palace ([[永樂宮]]), and became the official residence of the empress dowager.
